units: J/mol (adjusted for R=8.314 standard to match old R=1 calculations)
description: Legacy test system for validating R=8.314 standard
CEC values adjusted (old_value × 8.314) to preserve physics
reference: Dummy system for legacy MCS reproducibility testing
notes: Binary A-B system with minimal interactions. Use T=6.2 K and R=1.0 to reproduce old calculations exactly. Same BCC_A2_T cluster model as Nb-Ti_BCC_A2_T.
